channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘Backlash’—Microsoft Now Tells Millions Of Windows Users To Upgrade
item.description: Here's why Microsoft says you should buy a new Windows PC — but beware the risks.

item.title: Google’s New Android Update Locks Your Apps And Hides Your Messages
item.description: What you need to know before this next update hits your phone.

item.title: California’s New Law On AI Companions Gets Underway To Protect Users From Mental Ruin By Pushy LLMs

item.title: Google’s Free Offer For 2 Billion Gmail Users—Should You Upgrade?
item.description: You will now be upgraded unless you change your settings — what you need to know.
